Uses of Class
model.map.Square

  • Packages that use Square 
    Package Description
    controller
    Contains all the different controllers, the main logic of the game is here
    model
    Describes all the Adrenaline game objects and parts
    model.map
    Contains all the classes used to describe the arenas
    model.player
    Contains all the classes used to model a player

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Square> Map.getAllowedSquaresInDirection​(Directions direction, Square square)
      This method gives back all the allowed (if there is a wall the evaluation stops) in a certain direction
      java.util.List<Square> Map.getAllSquaresInDirection​(Directions direction, Square square)
      This method returns all (without using rules, such as moving through walls) the squares in a certain direction from a square starting point

      This method returns all (without using rules, such as moving through walls) the squares in a certain direction from a square starting point
